text: Kim Won-sik, known by his stage name Ravi, is a South Korean rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer. He is a former member of the South Korean boy group VIXX and its sub-unit VIXX LR. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean singer-songwriters Category:South Korean rappers Category:South Korean record producers Category:Singers from Seoul
title: Ravi (rapper)
